name: TRIGGER WARNING (Magical)
description:
- Trigger Warning - 

Trigger Warning is a game about a mentally ill man forced by the government to join in on a mission to kill anyone on sight in an unknown neighborhood. 

After completing his mission he took his chance to escape and is now on the run equipped with a gun and enough ammunition to do severe damage to anyone that comes close.

It is strongly advised to not approach the man as he is armed and dangerous, if you see him call the authorities immediately.

This game contains: Mature Content such as  violence, blood and weapons. proceed to download this game with caution if you are sensitive to any of these.

All of the characters in this game are fictional and is not supposed resemble any person that exists in real life. 

(note that the faces used for the mugshots are generated using artificial intelligence)
